title: Study reveals Big Pharma, Big Tech, MSM, government colluded to censor COVID-19 dissent
cleaned_text:
A recent study has revealed that government and medical authorities, as well as Big Pharma, Big Tech and mainstream media (MSM), colluded into suppressing medical practitioners who went against the official Wuhan coronavirus (COVID-19) narrative.

Titled “Censorship and Suppression of Covid-19 Heterodoxy: Tactics and Counter-Tactics,” the study found that those involved in the collusion targeted academic journals and opinions on social media. Still, esteemed scientists and doctors have managed to find ways to spread their truth. (Related: Revealed: Shocking new report uncovers massive collusion between Big Tech and federal govt. to stifle conservatives under guise of fighting ‘misinformation.‘)

According to the five researchers that conducted the study, there had been attempts to silence well-credentialed and highly accomplished medical experts on the origins of SARS-CoV-2, mask mandates, the efficacy of drugs such as hydroxychloroquine and ivermectin, the usefulness of lockdowns and restrictions, the effectiveness of vaccines and whether vaccine mandates and passports were appropriate.

“Many of them leading experts working in prestigious universities and/or hospitals, some of whom have authored books and published dozens or even hundreds of papers and whose studies have been widely cited,” the paper stated.

The study involved long-form interviews with 13 doctors from different countries.

According to reports, there was a broad range of tactics employed to “zip the mouths” of the true experts. The study indicated that some MSM outlets completely stopped interviewing them. The respondents claimed they were defamed while being tagged as “anti-vaxxers,” “COVID deniers,” “misinformation spreaders” or “conspiracy theorists.”

Some of them were banned or suspended on various social media portals, streaming sites and search engines. One expert said he even experienced censorship on Google Docs.

“Google Docs started restricting and censoring my ability to share documents … This is an organization telling me that I cannot send a private communication to a colleague or to a friend, or to a family member,” he told the researchers.

There was also suppression by academic and medical communities. Some of these oppressed practitioners also reported receiving warnings or being dismissed from their committee positions without being given valid reasons. Some have faced hearings for the revocation of their medical license or multi-million-dollar lawsuits from their the health departments of their respective countries. Journal articles were also pulled from publication or rejected without peer review.

Some suffered harassment, with one doctor saying the police suddenly arrived with no warrant to search his house.

Big Tech has long been involved in the collusion to stop real experts from debunking the generated COVID-19 narrative.

As per the study, Google down-ranked the open letter called Great Barrington Declaration on the search engine. To manipulate exposure, it altered its search algorithm. Meanwhile, Facebook deleted the declaration founders’ accounts on its platform.

The said open letter was started by Dr. Martin Kulldorff of Harvard University, Dr. Jay Bhattacharya of Stanford University and Dr. Sunetra Gupta of Oxford University on October 2020. They got over 54,000 notable scientists and doctors to sign this declaration. Its main concern was about the damaging physical and mental health impacts of the prevailing COVID-19 policies such as lockdowns.

In 2021, LinkedIn and Twitter both removed on their platforms the accounts of Dr. Robert Malone, an internationally renowned virologist involved in the development of mRNA vaccines.

“This heavy censorship was done with the encouragement of governments, which cooperated with tech companies such as Facebook, Twitter and Google,” the study said.

Visit MedicalCensorship.com for more more stories like this.
